MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH54 postcode area of Livingston. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9.10am to repair electrical equipment on Adelaide Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.14am on Tuesday 2nd February 2021.
